title: Instructional Design Course Based on Online Language Learning Design Patterns [Large-Scale]

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Language Proficiency and Experience with Online Learning
context.additional_context: A structured online learning environment applying learning design patterns, focusing on asynchronous learning with digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 90% weekly goal attainment in online language learning modules based on instructional design patterns
Learners exchange and incorporate peer feedback ≥2 times through structured discussion activities within the LMS
Learners accurately apply ≥80% of target language grammatical structures through stepwise learning activities
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
